name: Droppin' Ruins
description:
AVOID, CLIMB, SURVIVE!

A world where mechanical technology has developed and magic is becoming the thing of the past…
An ancient land where many treasure hunters are in search of the relics of ancient civilization…
Become a treasure hunter to search and explore the ruins of the lost civilization.

Features:

● EASY TO PLAY
Playable with one-hand!
All you need to do is flick or swipe the screen.

● FULL OF TRAPS
Falling blocks aren't the only ones waiting for you!
Avoid deadly traps to collect treasures and return home to safety!

● UNIQUE CHARACTERS
Choose treasure hunters with unique skills and looks!
